_description: RSI Scalping Ultra 1m - HIGHEST FREQUENCY (46% in 7 days)

_performance.verdict: ⚠️ HIGH FREQUENCY - Hits 10/day goal but VERY HIGH RISK

_how_it_works: Ultra-aggressive 1-minute scalping with tight RSI bands. Generates 44 trades/day but requires constant monitoring. High drawdown and very low win rate.
_warning: This strategy has 53% max drawdown and 0.3% win rate. Use with caution and proper risk management. Consider 5m timeframes for better risk/reward.
